00009 /*the basic on and off functions are available to external users,
00010   but the recommended use is through the dev_write call*/
00011 
00021 #ifndef _AVR_EEPROM_H
00022 #define _AVR_EEPROM_H
00023 
00024 /* The following EEPROM areas are used by various components of MOS:
00025  * 
00026  * 0x000 to 0x00B               Boot control block              (see boot.h)
00027  * 0x00C to 0x01F               Deluge control block    (see deluge.c)
00028  * 0x020 to 0x07F               Deluge page CRC's               (see deluge.c)
00029  * 0x080 to 0x0B3               Metadata for simple file system (see simple_fs.c)
00030  * 0x0B4 to 0xFFF               Unused space
00031  */
00032 #define DELUGE_INSTANCE_COUNT (4)
00033 
00034 #define DELUGE_CONTROL_BLOCK_ADDR (0x00C) /* Right after the boot CB */
00035 #define DELUGE_CONTROL_BLOCK_SIZE (16)
00036 
00037 #define DELUGE_DIRECTORY_ADDR (DELUGE_CONTROL_BLOCK_ADDR +      \
00038                                DELUGE_INSTANCE_COUNT *          \
00039                                DELUGE_CONTROL_BLOCK_SIZE)
00040 
00041 #define DELUGE_DIRECTORY_SIZE (1)
00042 
00043 #define DELUGE_PAGE_CRC_ADDR (DELUGE_DIRECTORY_ADDR +   \
00044                               DELUGE_INSTANCE_COUNT *   \
00045                               DELUGE_DIRECTORY_SIZE)
00046 
00047 #define SIMPLE_FS_ADDR  (DELUGE_PAGE_CRC_ADDR + 96)
00048 #define SIMPLE_FS_MAX_FILES 10
00049 #define SIMPLE_FS_SIZE  (2 + SIMPLE_FS_MAX_FILES * 12)
00050 
00051 #define DELUGE_STATS_ADDR       (SIMPLE_FS_ADDR + SIMPLE_FS_SIZE)
00052 #define DELUGE_STATS_COUNT 32
00053 #define DELUGE_STATS_SIZE 8             // 4 16-bit fields
00054 
00055 #define AVR_EEPROM_UNUSED_ADDR  (DELUGE_STATS_ADDR + \
00056                                  DELUGE_STATS_COUNT * \
00057                                  DELUGE_STATS_SIZE)
00058 
00061 void avr_eeprom_init(void);
00062 
00063 #endif
